name: Bluffin
content: That little sh*t you talking about
I got I got I got I got so much
So much so much so much
I got I got I got I got so much
My little niggas got more money
And I smoke so much d**e
I got OG in my IV
That sh*t don't even surprise me
I don't even want it back
Sh*t it's off to the good
Bring that sh*t back to the hood
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
We all travel safe and go really far
Chances dog that's what we take
Roll up one that's what we face
Lot of y'all claim that you real
But that sh*t don't mean a thing
And stacking all of this change
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
I got I got I got I got so much
Live it up every dollar spend it up
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
I think I should pay for all this
I just spend it like it's nothing
They spend how much they say
Hey man green is for the money
Step up your game or step down
Whenever a problem troubles us all
If you trust in the Lord
There will be a brighter tomorrow
Too much for the great God to do
And all that he asks and expects of you
But without God testing of our soul
It never could reach the ultimate goal
So keep on knowing and believing
You would be yours to receive
